name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Accomplished Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience specializing in **React**, **Python**, **TypeScript**, **FastAPI**, and SQL for building high-performance applications. Proficient in developing dynamic user interfaces with **Redux** and implementing robust automated testing methodologies using **Jest** and **React Testing Library**. Skilled in continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) processes to ensure seamless software deployment.

Expert in Agile Management methodologies, including **Scrum** and experience using tools like **Jira** and **Confluence** for efficient team collaboration. Demonstrated capability in leveraging **AI-assisted development tools** to enhance productivity. I have successfully led the development of complex solutions that comply with industry standards (HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, SOC 2) while ensuring robust architecture through microservices and event-driven systems.

My strong communication skills complement my technical expertise, allowing me to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams. Additionally, I have hands-on experience in developing and implementing MLOps workflows to optimize machine learning operations.
